name: Dr. Faisal Moola
bio: Associate Prof. U of Guelph: People, Plants & Policy Lab. Scientist working in solidarity w Indigenous Peoples in the stewardship of nature. #LiverpoolFC ⚽️
location: (Guelph): Guest on the ancestral lands of the Attawandaron people and the Treaty lands and territory of the Mississaugas of the Credit.
